bib.title: Evaluating KGR10 Polish word embeddings in the recognition of temporal expressions using BiLSTM-CRF
bib.author: Koco{\'n}, Jan and Gawor, Micha{\l}
bib.abstract: The article introduces a new set of Polish word embeddings, built using KGR10 corpus, which contains more than 4 billion words. These embeddings are evaluated in the problem of recognition of temporal expressions (timexes) for the Polish language. We described the
